detectors.description:
DrainMe.unlockSecret() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#85-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- secret % 5 == 0 (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#88)

DrainMe.callFirstTarget() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#97-101) ignores return value by firstTarget.call.value(msg.value)() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#100)

DrainMe.callSecondTarget() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#103-107) ignores return value by secondTarget.call.value(msg.value)() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#106)

DrainMe.winPrize() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#131-134) ignores return value by owner.call.value(1)() (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#133)

DrainMe.unlockSecret().secret (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#87) shadows:
	- DrainMe.secret (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#26) (state variable)
Pragma version^0.4.23 (contractSource/SmartBug/0xb620cee6b52f96f3c6b253e6eea556aa2d214a99.sol#12) allows old versions
solc-0.4.26 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.26 is not recommended for deployment
